name: California Academy of Sciences
description: The California Academy of Sciences in Golden Gate Park is a world-class scientific and cultural institution featuring a natural history museum, aquarium, planetarium, and rainforest all under one living roof.
fullDescription: The California Academy of Sciences in Golden Gate Park is a world-class scientific and cultural institution featuring a natural history museum, aquarium, planetarium, and rainforest all under one living roof.
whatTheyOffer:
- Museums for All: $3 per person with EBT card
- SF Resident Free Days: Free admission for SF residents (check schedule)
- Neighborhood Free Days: Free for specific SF zip codes (rotating)
- Children under 3: Always free
- Regular admission: $34-39 for adults
howToGetIt: For Museums for All, present your EBT card and photo ID at the admissions desk. For SF Resident Free Days, bring proof of residence. Reservations are required for all visits - book online in advance.
address: 55 Music Concourse Drive, San Francisco, CA 94118
keywords: California Academy of Sciences, Cal Academy, Golden Gate Park, aquarium, planetarium, rainforest, Museums for All, EBT $3, natural history
